Instance.description: A SituationGoal representing X Sims simultaneously running the same interaction or a set of uniquely tagged interactions.

TunableTuple.name: _goal_test
TunableTuple.description: A tunable defining parameters for interaction and/or interaction tags available on sim_count number of sims simultaneously. Note: If this is a joinable interaction, you MUST use tags, not affordances.

Tunable.name: affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance in question that is being run by all the sims.

TunableVariant.name: sim_count
TunableVariant.description: The number of sims simultaneously running the appropriate interactions.

TunableTuple.name: fixed
TunableTuple.description: Required number of sims based on a fixed number.

Tunable.name: count
Tunable.description: A fixed count of how many sims are required (default).

TunableTuple.name: sims_in_situation
TunableTuple.description: Required number of sims is based on sims in the situation (optionally also with a given job).

TunableList.name: required_jobs
TunableList.description: If this list is non-empty then only sims with the given job(s) will be counted.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: A set of tags that match the affordance being run by all the sims.

Tunable.name: _select_all_instantiated_sims
Tunable.description: If true, the goal system selects all instantiated sims in the zone.
